locutie.beschrijving: The preacher uses the narrative of San Quentin prisoners, the conversion of St. Paul, and the character of Nicodemus to explain the transition from retributive justice to restorative justice in Christ.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. Strong grasp of Paul's 'flesh vs spirit' dichotomy and the concept of the Paraclete as a legal advocate.

illocutie.beschrijving: The preacher moves from asserting the reality of the gospel's 'foolishness' to declaring the freedom found in the Spirit.
voorbeelden: I am not ashamed of the gospel
The law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus has set me free
The Spirit blows where it wills

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To strip away the hearer's 'nice person' facade and lead them to accept the 'foolish' restorative justice of God.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Explicitly high; the sermon focuses on the Spirit as the 'Advocate' who performs the work.

voorbeelden: There was a little article in the Charlotte Observer
Paul was a man of towering intellectual stature
The gospel does not confer blessings upon nice people
Do not marvel that I said to you
I don’t want you to think that this sermon is soft on murder
The Spirit... might even blow on you this very hour
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strongly rooted in the character of God as Advocate, though often framed as general truths.

voorbeelden: There is therefore now no condemnation
The law of the Spirit... has set me free
declaratieven.autoriteit: The preacher relies on the authority of the Scriptural text to make the declaration.

indicatoren: Extensive storytelling about Larry King and San Quentin
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes an observer of God's work in others (prisoners, Paul) rather than a participant.

missende_elementen: First-person sacramental address ('I declare to you')
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Intellectual agreement without necessarily feeling the 'blow' of the Spirit.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: High theological quality, but often phrased as a description of what God does generally.
voorbeelden: In the Cross of Christ, retributive justice... is replaced by restorative justice.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Preacher identifying with the 'nice people' and the 'elite'.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Directly challenging the 'nice' congregation in Linville.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used to apply the 'new birth' to the specific audience.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Talking about Paul, Nicodemus, Larry King, and the prisoners.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a narrative distance that requires a 'bridge' to the present.

verleden_tijd.gebruik: Biblical history and the news report from Friday.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Theological truths about the Law and Spirit.

actueel_present.gebruik: The 'now' of the sermon event in Linville.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: The sermon moves from the 'Assertive' (The story of the prisoners) to the 'Declarative' (No condemnation) to the 'Commissive' (The Spirit blows on you).
voorbeelden: The just requirement of the law is fulfilled for us... so that we are enabled... to live the new life.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: Strong. The indicative of grace clearly precedes the call to be 'new men'.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: The law of the Spirit... has set me free... We no longer live according to the flesh.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: Despite a high word count of 'talking about' (constative), the sermon successfully pivots to a performative address that seeks to 'happen' to the hearer.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: In the Cross of Christ, retributive justice... is replaced by restorative justice.
sterke_punten.effect: Changes the hearer's reality from being judged to being defended.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The first 500 words regarding Larry King.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: The sermon becomes an event when it moves from the 'prisoners out there' to 'the Spirit blowing on you here'.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: It functions as a means of grace by proclaiming the 'Toezegging' (Promise) of the Advocate.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Yes, through the metaphor of the Spirit as Advocate.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Implicitly, as the one announcing the 'Witness for the Defense'.
tekstueel_bewijs: The Spirit blows where it wills. It might even blow on you this very hour.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Yes, the preacher acknowledges the Spirit's unpredictable movement.
tekstueel_bewijs: The action of the Holy Spirit... is to make Christ’s saving death present and powerful.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Yes, the sermon is treated as the delivery of the 'restorative justice'.
tekstueel_bewijs: There is a whole new world open to us.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is heavy on past-tense narrative verbs but finishes with strong present-tense performatives.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The gospel does not confer blessings upon nice people.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Today, this Gospel strips away your 'niceness' to give you Christ's life.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from a general principle to a present-tense act.

voorbeeldzinnen: I announce to you: your Defense Counsel has won your case.

adressering_verbetering.probleem: Too much time spent on 'them' (prisoners) before 'you'.
adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Interweave the 'you' earlier in the San Quentin narrative.
voorbeeldzinnen: Like those men in San Quentin, you too stand before a bar of judgment.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using narrative to set the stage for a powerful, sacramental declaration of grace.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the preacher's 'self-revelation' as a 'nice person'; SAT focuses on the 'Declarative' power of the Word to change the hearer's status.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetoric would seek to persuade the hearer that restorative justice is a good idea; SAT seeks to actually 'bestow' that justice through the proclamation.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that the sermon's power is not in the Larry King story, but in the shift to the 'Commissive' act where God binds Himself to the hearer as Advocate.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: There is therefore now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: The theological hinge of the sermon.

appendices.notities: The sermon effectively uses the 'Witness' metaphor to bridge the gap between the constative (testimony) and the performative (the verdict of grace).
